info.title: Notes API
info.description: A RESTful API for managing notes with priority filtering

get.description: Retrieves the collection of all notes, with optional filtering capabilities

parameters.name: priority[gt]
parameters.description: Filter notes with priority greater than value

parameters.name: priority[gte]
parameters.description: Filter notes with priority greater than or equal to value

parameters.name: priority[lt]
parameters.description: Filter notes with priority less than value

parameters.name: priority[lte]
parameters.description: Filter notes with priority less than or equal to value

post.description: Creates a new note with the provided data

get.description: Retrieves all notes matching the specified priority value
Retrieves a specific note by ID

patch.description: Partially updates an existing note with the provided data

propertyPath.description: The property path of the violation

message.description: The message associated with the violation

propertyPath.description: The property path of the violation

message.description: The message associated with the violation

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type
